content: Apologies if this has already been discussed but in the dateTime data type the time zone seems more like an offset (except for "Z"). Would it make sense to change terminology or would that just confuse people? http://build.fhir.org/datatypes.html#dateTime
you could make a task for us to tidy up the language

you could make a task for us to tidy up the language

Done: https://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=24564
